about_the_game:
About the Game:

You are a robot who has awakened in an unfamiliar world. Your battery is nearly depleted. Your memory is wiped. The only thing that’s clear—you need a power source, fast. But this world won’t give you anything for free.

To survive, you must explore your surroundings, solve puzzles, and overcome challenges that will test not only your abilities but also your will to exist. As you search for energy, you will uncover the secrets of the past, traces of forgotten civilizations, and perhaps even the answers to questions you haven't thought to ask yet.

Can you uncover your true nature and discover why you were created?

Game Features:

  • A thrilling adventure with RPG elements and multi-genre gameplay

  • Diverse challenges—from puzzles to dynamic combat

  • An atmospheric world full of mysteries and unexpected discoveries

  • A thought-provoking story about the nature of consciousness and free will

  • A unique visual style that enhances the game’s immersive atmosphere

  • A direct narrative approach—no cryptic hints or unnecessary obscurity

  • Minimal hidden secrets and collectibles (but who knows...)

name: powerless

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Graphics: RTX 4090
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: A simple storyline adventure about a robot whose battery is about to run out. You will need to help the robot navigate this difficult journey, overcoming many different challenges in search of a new battery. This game is exactly what it seems, honestly!
